title: Job Vacancies at D.I.K International Limited
content:
D.I.K International Limited is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Housekeeper

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Housekeeper will be responsible for ensuring cleanliness, organization, and a high standard of hygiene in assigned areas.
	Duties include cleaning rooms, laundryand assisting with general upkeep to provide a comfortable and welcoming environment.
	Wash, dry, fold, and store linens, towels, and clothing items. Ensure laundry is kept organized and inventory is maintained.
	Clean and sanitize high-touch surfaces, such as doorknobs, light switches, remote controls, countertops, and furniture to ensure health and safety standards are met.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an FSLC qualification with 1 - 3 years of work experience. 


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: recruitmentmanager@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Security Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	The Security Officer will be responsible for ensuring the safety and security of the premises, employees, and visitors by monitoring activities, patrolling designated areas, and responding to emergencies.
	The officer will enforce rules and regulations, provide customer service, and prevent incidents of crime or unauthorized activity.
	Respond quickly and effectively to security breaches, emergencies, or incidents such as theft, vandalism, or medical emergencies.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an FSLC qualification with 1 - 3 years of work experience.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: recruitmentmanager828@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Driver

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Drive employees or clients to various destinations as per the company’s schedule and requirements.
	Ensure safe and timely deliveries of goods, documents, or materials to designated locations
	Conduct daily inspections of the vehicle to ensure it is safe and operational (check tire pressure, fuel levels, oil, brakes, lights, etc.).
	Maintain the cleanliness of the vehicle, inside and out.
	Report any mechanical issues or accidents to the supervisor promptly.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: recruitmentmanager828@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

4.) I.T Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Install, configure, and maintain hardware (computers, servers, network devices) and software (operating systems, applications) across the organization.
	Manage local and wide area networks (LAN/WAN) to ensure smooth communication and connectivity.
	Provide first-line support for IT-related issues to staff, troubleshooting and resolving hardware, software, and network problems. Assist users with configuring systems, applications, and resolving technical issues in a timely manner.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s Degree with 1 - 3 years of work experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: recruitmentmanager828@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

5.) Maintenance Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Conduct regular inspections of facilities, equipment, and systems to identify any maintenance issues or potential hazards.
	Perform preventive maintenance tasks on equipment, HVAC systems, lighting, plumbing, etc.
	Respond promptly to maintenance requests, troubleshoot, and carry out repairs for electrical, plumbing, heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC), carpentry, and other facility-related issues.
	Maintain an inventory of tools, supplies, and replacement parts.
	Order new materials as required and ensure stock levels are adequate.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 1 - 3 years of experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: recruitmentmanager828@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "Carlcare Development Nigeria Limited is the Nigerian subsidiary of Transsion Holdings, the global leader behind TECNO, Infinix, itel, Oraimo, Syinix, and Carlcare. The company drives innovation and customer satisfaction across mobile devices, accessories, and services, while fostering a dynamic workplace where employees can grow and thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer

Job Location:&nbsp;Alaba, Sango, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an energetic and result-driven Marketer to promote and sell our products within Lagos markets.
	The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in retail or field sales, excellent communication skills, and a strong understanding of market dynamics.
	This role requires an outgoing, persuasive individual who enjoys interacting with customers and driving sales performance.


Key Responsibilities


	Actively promote and sell company products to retailers, wholesalers, and end customers.
	Conduct regular field visits to generate leads, follow up on prospects, and close sales deals.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with customers and market stakeholders.
	Gather market intelligence and report competitor activities, pricing, and trends.
	Achieve monthly sales targets and performance goals.
	Take clear product display photos and share daily market updates using a smartphone.
	Participate in marketing promotions, product demonstrations, and other brand activation activities.
	Work closely with the sales and marketing team to execute market strategies and campaigns.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Education: Minimum of SSCE / OND (Marketing, Business, or related field preferred).
	Experience: Minimum of 2 years of experience in retail or field sales, preferably in electronics or solar industries.
	Familiarity with Lagos wholesale markets is an added advantage.
	Language: Fluent in English; knowledge of Yoruba, Igbo, or Pidgin English is an advantage.


Method of Application&nbsp;

Marketer Job at Carlcare Development Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Carlcare Development Nigeria Limited is the Nigerian subsidiary of Transsion Holdings, the global leader behind TECNO, Infinix, itel, Oraimo, Syinix, and Carlcare. The company drives innovation and customer satisfaction across mobile devices, accessories, and services, while fostering a dynamic workplace where employees can grow and thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer

Job Location: Alaba, Sango, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking an energetic and result-driven Marketer to promote and sell our products within Lagos markets.
	The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in retail or field sales, excellent communication skills, and a strong understanding of market dynamics.
	This role requires an outgoing, persuasive individual who enjoys interacting with customers and driving sales performance.


Key Responsibilities


	Actively promote and sell company products to retailers, wholesalers, and end customers.
	Conduct regular field visits to generate leads, follow up on prospects, and close sales deals.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with customers and market stakeholders.
	Gather market intelligence and report competitor activities, pricing, and trends.
	Achieve monthly sales targets and performance goals.
	Take clear product display photos and share daily market updates using a smartphone.
	Participate in marketing promotions, product demonstrations, and other brand activation activities.
	Work closely with the sales and marketing team to execute market strategies and campaigns.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Education: Minimum of SSCE / OND (Marketing, Business, or related field preferred).
	Experience: Minimum of 2 years of experience in retail or field sales, preferably in electronics or solar industries.
	Familiarity with Lagos wholesale markets is an added advantage.
	Language: Fluent in English; knowledge of Yoruba, Igbo, or Pidgin English is an advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: adebayo.deborah@transsion.comusing the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Senior Human Resources Personnel Job at NoemDek Limited




        
    

        
        NoemDek Limited is an EPC Company incorporated in Nigeria in 2012, to provide specialized services to the Oil & Gas, Power Generation, FMCGs, etc. Over the past five years, the firm and its international partners have supported clients on large infrastructure projects and after-sales services to ensure the assets are maintained effectively and a client’s operations run smoothly.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Human Resources Personnel

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos

Job Description 
The candidate will be responsible for:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	 Developing and implementing HR strategies aligned with organizational goals and objectives. 
	 Managing recruitment, onboarding, and employee relations.
	Overseeing performance management and staff development.
	 Managing compensation, benefits, and HR reporting..
	 Developing, updating, and communicating HR policies and procedures..
	 Identifying training needs and coordinating relevant programs.
	 Driving employee engagement and a positive work culture.
	 Ensuring compliance with all relevant employment laws and regulations.


Academic and Professional Qualifications 


	First Degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or other related fields.
	 Relevant professional certification is an added advantage.


Technical Skills:


	 Strong understanding of HR principles, practices, and employment laws.
	 Experience in developing and implementing HR strategies and policies.
	 Proficiency in MS Office Suite.
	 Ability to design and implement training and development programs.
	 Experience in compensation and benefits administration.
	 Experience in employee relations, talent acquisition, and retention strategies.
	 Excellent written and oral communication skills
	 Typing speed of 40WPM.


Soft Skills:


	 Strategic thinker with the ability to translate HR strategies into actionable plans.
	 Strong leadership and people management skills. 
	 Excellent ethical values and discretion in handling confidential information.
	 Positive attitude and strong interpersonal skills.
	 Meticulous attention to detail.


Work Experience:


	 Minimum of 3 years of relevant work experience
	 Experience working in a structured organization is preferred.
	 This is not an entry-level role.
